tech.ferus.util.sql

Class BasicSql

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.ferus.util.sql.BasicSql

  • public final class BasicSql
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class meant to make use of the tools provided in BasicSql.

      • returnQuery

        public static <T> java.util.Optional<T> returnQuery(java.lang.String statement,
                                                    ReturnResults<T> returnResults)
        Returns the data gathered from a query.

        Uses the default Database.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the Type of object being returned
        Parameters:
        statement - the statement to be queried
        returnResults - determines which data to return from a ResultSet
        Returns:
        the data from a ResultSet wrapped in an Optional. Optional.empty() otherwise.

                                                    Preparer preparer,

        Uses the default Database.

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        preparer - the Preparer to set the data in the statement

        Returns:
        the data from a ResultSet wrapped in an Optional. Optional.empty() otherwise.

      • close

        private static void close(java.lang.String statement,
                          java.sql.Connection c,
                          java.sql.Statement s,
                          java.sql.ResultSet r)
        Closes any open objects from the attempted queries and executions.

        Should work on:

        • Connection
        • Statement
        • ResultSet
        Parameters:
        statement - the statement that was queried or executed
        c - the Connection that was used
        s - the Statement object generated from the statement
        r - the ResultSet that was gathered from a query
